content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Plan 2024 vacation today, and book your stay at the most iconic Zagreb hotel!

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Indulge in sumptuous rooms, distinctive service, and impressive views of the city. Get 30% off accommodation in this unique historical hotel in the heart of Zagreb, which will delight you with its long tradition, beautiful architecture and interior, and award-winning gourmet offer.

 

Book your accommodation through hotel’s website www.esplanade.hr between 21 and 29 November 2023 (not applicable for certain periods)! Bookings can only be made through the official website of the Esplanade Hotel for the period of 1 January to 30 December 2024, subject to availability of accommodation. The discount only applies to the booking of accommodation, and not the food and drinks offer. The discount cannot be exchanged for money or other hotel services and cannot be combined or aggregated with other discounts.

 

The accommodation booking can be cancelled free of charge only by 16:00 hrs on the day before arrival. In case of cancellation after this time or in case of no-show, your credit card will be charged for the first night at the price stated in your booking confirmation.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

BLACK FRIDAY BOOKING

For any additional information, please contact the Reservations department:

+385 (0)1 45 666 00

reservations@esplanade.hr

www.esplanade.hr

 

 

Published: 21.11.2023.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Indulge in sumptuous rooms, distinctive service, and impressive views of the city. Get 30% off accommodation
